name: FMT Consulting
goal: Independent education consultant, mainly dealing with training/ capacity building, quality assurance, national qualification Frameworks (especially SCQF) and ECVET related research and training. I am one of the UK's ECVET Experts.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs
euInitiatives: Membership of ECVET Users Group; UK ECVET EXpert. Contributor to ECVET Forum and Trans National Cooperation Activities such as the UK led 2017 TCA event "PEARL".
